verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye the <S%H3050>LORD<s%>. <S%H7891>Sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%>, and his <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H2623>saints<s%>.
Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in him that <S%H6213>made<s%> him: let the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> be <S%H1523>joyful<s%> in their <S%H4428>King<s%>.
Let them <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> in the <S%H4234>dance<s%>: let them sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto him with the <S%H8596>timbrel<s%> and <S%H3658>harp<s%>.
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> taketh <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in his <S%H5971>people<s%>: he will <S%H6286>beautify<s%> the <S%H6035>meek<s%> with <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.
Let the <S%H2623>saints<s%> be <S%H5937>joyful<s%> in <S%H3519>glory<s%>: let them sing <S%H7442>aloud<s%> upon their <S%H4904>beds<s%>.
Let the <S%H7319>high<s%> praises of <S%H410>God<s%> be in their <S%H1627>mouth<s%>, and a <S%H6374>twoedged<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%>;
To <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> upon the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and <S%H8433>punishments<s%> upon the <S%H3816>people<s%>;
To <S%H631>bind<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> with <S%H2131>chains<s%>, and their <S%H3513>nobles<s%> with <S%H3525>fetters<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>;
To <S%H6213>execute<s%> upon them the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%>: this <S%H1926>honour<s%> have all his <S%H2623>saints<s%>. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye the <S%H3050>LORD<s%>.
